post:
Hello guys, 
Its Hassan from ReverseHosts here offering you guys a special deal, that will only last until Thursday night. I will gladly answer any questions you guys have if there is not enough information in this thread. Thank you, have a good day.


**Node Information:**
AMD Phenom II x6 1045t (6 Cores / 6 Threads / 2.7Ghz / 3.2Ghz Turbo)
8GB DDR3 RAM
1Gbit Port
500GB HD
Kansas City,  Missouri, USA

**VPS Features:**
* SolusVM control panel
* Instant setup
* Not oversold
* Installation services available
* Unmanaged
* OpenVZ Virtualization
* Many different Linux templates (if you don't see the one you need you can just submit a ticket and we'll try our best to get it for you)

**Test File**
100mb file: http://142.54.172.55/100mb.test
Also test that IP for latency.

**Plan**
Server CPU - AMD Phenom II x6 1045t (4 cores)
Management: Unmanaged
Hard Disk - 75 GB
Dedicated RAM - 1536 DDR3
vSwap RAM - 1536MB DDR3
Traffic Per Month - 1 TB
Dedicated IP - 1 IPv4
Network Connection - 1 Gbps
Location: USA
Only **$6.99/monthly**
[Order Now](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?gid=6)
